Reviews.Title: “Keep on looking!”
Reviews.Author: KevinandMarilyn
Reviews.Content: partner recently stayed two nights intended weekend luxury birthday arrival hotel later intended due prebooked airport transfer didnt show glad met friendly reception journey room fifth floor initially concerned slightly grubby dated decor lift corridor room entering room soon discover 4 superior double far 1 would appropriate stains ceiling flooding cracked floor tiles bathroom limited space 10 either side bed details made superior room anything luxurious asking moved something appropriate told possible though hotel fully booked staff helpful point hotel 4

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and talented staff, so-so rooms”
Reviews.Author: RMarieMpls
Reviews.Content: booked hotel one night short notice hotel located close dam square use public easy three steps away door rooms ok little bit worn needs upgrade view straight ac temp warm night one room euro

Reviews.Title: “Auwful Hotel - not worth of 2*”
Reviews.Author: larisa l
Reviews.Content: said hotel location exploring amsterdam complaints hotel apart room furnishings looking little tired could upgrading make truly 4 hotel room back hotel little noise overlooked rooms hotel view expected middle amsterdam modern thing room flat screen v room bathroom good size clean tidy would need stay staff pleasant helpful deal included breakfast good plentiful enjoyed stay hotel one thing would say though rooms air conditioning room still quite hot window open hot

Reviews.Title: “Quiet Hotel”
Reviews.Author: wp327
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel towards end june 2007 hotel clean room spacious room split 2 levels managed get deal included breakfast good selection would worth paying seemed quite expensive staff nice spoke english hotel centrally located walk dam square 10 minutes walk central station traveling schipol get train airport main station takes walk easily hotel hotel restaurant bar connected serves good selection food day nice hotel however would say true 4 hotel complaints

Reviews.Title: “Not Promising”
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo S
Reviews.Content: first stop three week vacation unhappy hotel problems two day stay 1 telephone service phones two days couldnt call room room even front desk 2 terrible beds must used since opening feel 3 bathroom drains shower curtain 4 staff result however nice 5 terrible value paid one night second night hotel comparison hotels price range stayed rest vacation far worse value

Reviews.Title: “Definitely not a 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: adnilb
Reviews.Content: perfect location middle 50 dam square couple tram stops amsterdam centraal according typical amsterdam buildings halls reception quite tiny opinion rooms fine upgraded superior room jacuzzi work rooms could wooden beams roof normal ones breakfast taken brasserie fine excellent correct important take table views enormous windows lots tram lines stops near hotel get 120 eur good choice

Reviews.Title: “Princess Hotel - nothing Royal about it.”
Reviews.Author: RenLenCar
Reviews.Content: stayed die port late birthday present wife feb 2007 everyone says location great literally 1 minute dam sq right heart things stayed room faced back bit noisy middle amsterdam reception great super speedy concierge great guy ask anything places go get excellent english spoken always face breakfast well average help buffet style cereals fresh fruit cold meats cheeses english breakfast pastries etc etc eat rooms site say small european standards clean tidy new lcd flat panel tvs room tea coffee making facility excellent free safe room ensuite good â€“ nice supply hot water good power shower overall good hotel great location downstairs reception bar dining room impressive upstairs rooms looks like thereâ€™s tons websites offering room deals suggestion shop around best rates definitely go recommendations well 2 days youre get lot done â€“ took boat trip â€“ canal bus â€“ good warm pleasant great place raining make sure try â€“ indonesian meal anything 10 30 indonesian dishes â€“ try address per person â€“ excellent place superb ambience food also try rembrandt corner beer â€“ get canal bus turn left bridge great beers great atmosphere superb food ps youre staying die port try plaza shopping mall next door great shops

Reviews.Title: “Not 4 star”
Reviews.Author: australiaClare
Reviews.Content: booked hotel per friend hotel excellent location 10 minute fast walk central station also airport bus stops note must book bus ride airport 2 hrs advance buy tickets lobby desk 12 euro need use trams one walk everywhere hint exit hotel turn right full service supermarket one block also buy service desk postcards may want send family friends room bathroom clean basic complaints ordered 2 late one night partying awful avoid room service would consider staying air conditioning summer

Reviews.Title: “Princess Hotel, Roma.”
Reviews.Author: retsuos
Reviews.Content: girlfriend returned amsterdam stayed arrived check process fast reception staff friendly went room soon opened door impressed room small musty date king size bed two singles put together couch old cover cover knew closet space store clothes dont mind living suitcase ok bar fridge immediately went front desk see could get another paying 25 euro night upgraded guest suite room lot larger first room room get room cleaned twice four nights stayed cleaned bed thing coffee give clean coffee cups wash movie cost asked wake call morning leaving airport never received originally going book going see booked happy travels

Reviews.Title: “Nice experience I would repeat as soon as I have to get back to Rome”
Reviews.Author: maud_arditti
Reviews.Content: booked superior room expedia 2 nights got third night free hotel really centrally located room overlooked edge dam square stayed room staying would request room noticed lot rooms nice view room large spacious split level pleasant surprise told rooms amsterdam generally small porter available take bags room would say room fan like request one rooms get really warm morning bar original heineken brewery lovely drank nights sure bring plenty money though

Reviews.Title: “Horrible”
Reviews.Author: munamunah
Reviews.Content: reading reviews already booked heart pleasant surprise even arriving late night found courteous smiling staff went find clean comfortable room heart city want loved inroom system courtesy tv breakfast wasnt included rate honestly cant comment bar prices average place youd spend whole evening anyway liked place lot would certainly return

Reviews.Title: “Uncomfortable and Unsatisfactory”
Reviews.Author: gagagurl
Reviews.Content: husband stayed die port van cleve november 2006 agree location far best amsterdam hotel historical building directly behind royal palace dam square major tram lines within steps building though tram hardly necessary majority sights within short enjoyable walk room small even europe comfortable lot character really enjoyed read reviews state rooms smell like mildew probably everywhere amsterdam surrounded water slight mildew smell expected anywhere especially historical buildings complaint breakfast cost 18 euro worth 2 euro hot food cold nothing replenished even full dining room inconvenience reason dutch restaraunts dont open like 11 even serve breakfast hotel restaraunt place open disappointed definitely stay die port van cleve next time afford stay hotel 12 stayed

Reviews.Title: “Quite bad.”
Reviews.Author: singpon
Reviews.Content: booked mini break boyfriend decided stay die port van cleve sounded good got 3 nights discounted rate standard double room however reading reviews trip advisor prior going wished hadnt booked pleasantly surprised arrived find magnificent old building dam square friendly staff lovely clean comfortable room arrived delighted able go straight room instead wait room good size modern flat screen tv comfortable beds good bathroom large bath shower room quiet soundproofed windows breakfast hotel well worth getting food served restaurant amazing reasonable value best steak town definately recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Satisfactory”
Reviews.Author: jmontano8421
Reviews.Content: stayed die port van cleve boyfriend attending conference amsterdam booked us read reviews prior going say one thing hotel rooms ac important note ac weather hot hotel nice enough put fan room complaint ac common amsterdam ac rare said location great right near shopping red light district hotel original heineken brewery hotel bar cute staff helpful enjoyed stay amsterdam die port van cleve

Reviews.Title: “OK hotel, but hard to get to and from the city centre”
Reviews.Author: jmilli
Reviews.Content: bought low cost flights turned walked way around amsterdam january low season bound find cheap good accommodation definately found 200 euros four nights us brilliant location hotel excellent right next dam square excellent really close everything want see hotel location good value money staff friendly go back amsterdam exactly turn see got really need book anything go one piece advice get main train station amsterdam walk bridge dont go left bridge looking hotels left red light district nice hotels come station walk straight bridge keep going straight 5 minutes walk get dam square find hotel lots choose try eating hotel restaurant try steak excellent

Reviews.Title: “Not so good”
Reviews.Author: misscroftTurkey
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 hotel weekend night given room broken furniture mold bathroom complaining offered discount room view exceptionally disappointing features

Reviews.Title: “Not so good”
Reviews.Author: eovieira
Reviews.Content: stayed amsterdam many times many different hotels far worst especially supposed 4 star booked special online deal per night seems hotel keeps terrible rooms deals standard double room smallest double ever stayed also cold fact went bathroom feet left marks tiles tv packed half way evening room service took time coming would care stay however good deal seems stayed much nicer 3 star hotels central

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: flyplayne
Reviews.Content: location outstanding lobby attractive nothing else even motel 6 standards rooms tiny dirty worn bathroom mildew carpet stained furniture looked like worn board stuff control radiator table fan 4 star hotel maybe 15

Reviews.Title: “You can do better”
Reviews.Author: CaliforniaPapa
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights girlfriend christmas day read reviews already buying ticket felt awful reviews bad got trip surprise girlfriend really bad made rooms cosy clean bathrooms match room service quick huge food bought traditional style hotel attached really unique added lovely touch atmosphere amsterdam got real good deal cost wise positive get price cheaper would go location speaks easily main selling point would go return die port van cleve

Reviews.Title: “Comfy Hotel”
Reviews.Author: BCgirl09
Reviews.Content: rooms huge stains carpet small hanging rack one broken closet furniture looked like picked street press falling wall view bedroom window filthy less 10 inches open window barely opened course ac bathroom one set open close bathroom windows shut second upgraded room first room used unclean toilet maid service efficient 2 lifts one broken 3 days room fair furniture lobby little better furniture room good rate unable double bed requested reception said fault contact hotel directly hotel carried 4 star rating canâ€™t imagine

Reviews.Title: “will not stay here again”
Reviews.Author: ydujgoh
Reviews.Content: april year parents came visit never wanted make visit special good central looked two got hotel location booked booked three bed room daughter staying got lift looked got floor got knew big grubby walls general wasnt bad room old bedding noise outside need warn seems photos holland

Reviews.Title: “a real let-down.”
Reviews.Author: Heath-in-Paris
Reviews.Content: booked hotel five day break expedia mainly based description picture superior room first room offered tiny dark staff quickly offered us room available modest improvement rooms much smaller example room expedia although expect best room neither promised seating area paid per night paid would dissapointing said reviewers get good price accept hotels little fantastic location enjoying amsterdam offer found room clean need refurbishment comfortable small side quiet staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “clean + handy base”
Reviews.Author: aliandsteve
Reviews.Content: price hotel great weekend getaway perhaps 4 star many 4 star hotels available centre amazing city 150 usd per night rooms small youre going hang room go breakfast looked amazing steep coffee room fantastic bakery around corner add 10 minute walk railway station good weekend

Reviews.Title: “Who cares how many stars??”
Reviews.Author: Indysmom
Reviews.Content: stayed june 2005 upon arrival given room annex hotel although small clean warm basic damp smell room looked directly another hotel room window noise constant expected location rooms cleaned daily basis beware excellent deal pizza night costing 5 euros turns 25 euros service charge positives good location friendly staff negatives expensive got

Reviews.Title: “Fine for large tour groups, but wouldn't choose to stay there”
Reviews.Author: inkwave17
Reviews.Content: got special rate via internet otherwise id say room little small price however comfortable spotless bathroom trams outside little noisy given central location desk staff extremely helpful restaurant food excellent traditional soup deserves special mention staff good staff serving breakfast young would probably benefit little training certainly ignored unlike one clients comment ive seen web site would certainly return

Reviews.Title: “simply horrible”
Reviews.Author: inagoodmood
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel three nights october 2011 tour group known saw property going one better rooms reminded college days living partial food adequate hotel supposedly 4 star found italy ratings best check trip advisor booking

Reviews.Title: “4 stars - what a lie!”
Reviews.Author: MagicBall
Reviews.Content: second trip rome decided stay beaten path selected princess hotel farther central rome within minutes car vatican hotel staff marvelous arrived early morning international flight wait 20 minutes ready room even though way check time sat quaint bar english italian bartender gave us excellent suggestions authentic local bistros locked room extremely prompt free shuttle drops south side st peters square perfect point staff room conditions rooms par little outdated otherwise clean

Reviews.Title: “so disappointed”
Reviews.Author: superpippa
Reviews.Content: first last time stay hotel old furniture airconditioner order breakfast miserable far metro 20 minutes foot far away city center internet available printer print keep away hotel old hotel year time 4 since time nothing changed hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not good”
Reviews.Author: CasalBrazil
Reviews.Content: hotel outside city quiet convenient city wonderful restaurant economical food service great rooms spacious small british rooms

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sam69
Reviews.Content: first time italy lot hotels italy thats expectations low princess hotel name quite world sounds like chain hotel everything hotel average room small noisy least plenty sun room hotel decoration needs soon

Reviews.Title: “Do NOT choose this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: robbiem
Reviews.Content: 4 star similar hotel travel agency like 2 star old holiday inn suited college rooms small lighting dim food terrible could pay rome tax credit card cash located nice area far walking distance center rome people group afraid go evening stroll

Reviews.Title: “Just Don't Plan to Stay in Your Room”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: hotel wasnt bad rooms cold thankfully hot rome aircon quite noisy unit sat window kind kept awake night hotel lobby amazingly nice cosy like sitting hotel staff nice one restaurant staff members sometimes made feel like inconvenience overall pretty good

Reviews.Title: “Let's say that it's a bit old”
Reviews.Author: Marla7
Reviews.Content: last hotel tour supposed 4 star small shower little old tv noisy old fashioned airconditioner room noisy located first floor near reception mold bathroom hardly 4 star dark dingy best thing p dont know uses hotel still one fellow travellers tour watch stolen man porter hotel take care security

Reviews.Title: “Really quite good”
Reviews.Author: barbarat85
Reviews.Content: stay booked hotel bookingcom read reviews trip advisor surprise trip husband reading reviews site apprehensive would find say people written bad reviews must stayed different hotel hotel fine bathroom linen changed every day hotel staff friendly particular sometimes get give treat respect respect return difficult guests staff work hard reasonable price paid satisfied yes little rome problems getting centre bus cornelia metro straight thing would make suggestion pleasant terrace could made use pool kept open longer shut monday end season temperature around 30 great trip

Reviews.Title: “bit of a mixed bag”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: tour 2 adults old rooms comfortable grounds clean well kept food bar limited nice bit expensive breakfast ok location bit rome us 45 minutes train two buses fantastic staff public transport helpful saw lot rome process bus stop right front gate would recommend clean comfortable place stay staff fantastic

Reviews.Title: “Reminds me of the Titanic”
Reviews.Author: love2travelpinay
Reviews.Content: princess advertised fourstar hotel stayed six nights june 30 – july 6 assume person rated must seeing double – hardly even deserves two stars bedroom minimal furniture air conditioning supplied via old unit whenever started first heard thought front loose problem screen behind grill don’t think screen could tried obviously cleaned several dust initial response front desk reported problem send porter thin strip wood went thought stepped get didn’t work reported problem front desk next morning said would fixed never bathroom ok except shower square cubicle maximum one square fitted corner room two sliding doors didn’t close fully leaving gap water making necessary lay towel floor showering prevent floor experience italian hotels sure next item example expectations running considered normal another country found annoying room absolutely information phone book hotel instructions use phone nothing – absolutely bare one final poor customer service came morning checked july 6 carrying postcards around couple days unable buy asked desk clerk offered put machine agreed leaving cards paying seems rate plus extra euro card one postcards wife arrived july 27 checked card ordinary july 16 heard cards sent arrived assume also sat desk 10 days finally doubt problem hotel caters large tour groups part band playing rome four including three high school us hotel time us booked tour company matter poor rooms service hotel owners know impossible group 50 check move another hotel unhappy improve

Reviews.Title: “A LOT Better than you'll imagine”
Reviews.Author: dublindec
Reviews.Content: hotel rated 4 star maybe certainly specifically booked hotel bit rome swimming pool yet arrived informed use end month stated anywhere website booking company complained asked could use facilities near hotel cost 20 euros per person per day asked would good gesture refused contacted website booked also contacted hotel refused us lack facilities advertised rooms basic adequate one good point beds comfortable however room smell like bathroom room offered rm didnt complain suspect would done anyway plus rarely room walls paper thin could actually couple next door clear room subway good 20 min walk hotel 4 bus stops away didnt try breakfast

Reviews.Title: “I would rather sleep on the streets than stay here again”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: hotel bit far rome theres nothing around bedroom awful could hear people next bedroom talking breakfast quite poor well staff could care less specially youre part tour

Reviews.Title: “Most Definitely, never again!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: didnt choose hotel came tour wasnt expecting something spectacular reviews read fine yes bath tub square water outside outside perfect stay near centre rome youre far cornelia station recommend map area particular since maps dont include zone easy zone walk internet free costs cents euro hall minute 7 euros hour room service hotel buy credit card theres internet point via near mcdonalds near cornelia station recommend going phone calls internet use everything else hotel satisfactory since real joy stay city recommend walk whole city day wont care hotel later also attention reception good

Reviews.Title: “The most impolite stuff in Rome!”
Reviews.Author: terina
Reviews.Content: stayed spouse june 2010 travelling budget tour group hotel fine rooms fine complaints staff actually helpful spoken english quite well pool closed disappointment breakfasts ok nothing special real complaint location hotel quite far metro greatest neighbourhood walk metro hotel took us get metro hotel walking quite quickly mind trouble getting city ok hotel looking something easy access city centre may hotel

Reviews.Title: “I would NOT recommend anyone to stay at this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: stayed princess hotel first two nights tour group realized hotel four location city center take taxi 15 euros take chance buses metro must dont chose taxi long way track reach metro way rooms small could find proper place put luggages wrong found live ones around room bed sheets bed cover quite clean bathroom thank god could find time take come hotel tour group less time hotel sleeping facility deal
